subject: Re: [junit] Constructor for test case called multiple times
msgSnippet: Yes: each test is run within its own TestCase object. *********** REPLY SEPARATOR  *********** ...  J. B. Rainsberger, President, Diaspar Software
messageBody:
Yes: each test is run within its own TestCase object.

*********** REPLY SEPARATOR ***********

On 2002-07-17 at 21:24 korosh_afshar wrote:

>It seems that depending on the number of unit test methods in my
>TestCase, the constructor is called that many times.
>
>Is this because of the way junit framework is setup?
<snip />
